contentrichtext.text: {{Confusing|date=August 2008}} {{Infobox person | name = Yuji Kishi | image = | imagesize = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1970|9|28}} | birth_place = [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] | death_date = | death_place = | occupation = [[Voice actor]] | employer = [[CUBCE Inc.]] | years_active = 1992-present | spouse = [[Mika Kikuchi]] (2009-11) }} {{nihongo|'''Yūji Kishi''' |born 岸 祐二|Kishi Yūji| September 28, 1970}} is a Japanese actor and [[Voice acting in Japan|voice actor]]. He and Mika had their acting debuts in a [[Super Sentai]] series and his role in the 20th [[sentai]] series [[Gekisou Sentai Carranger]] as [[Red Racer]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.sanspo.com/geino/news/091005/gnb0910050508002-n1.htm|title=菊地美香＆岸祐二、戦隊婚！"聖地"で挙式 (1/2ページ) - 芸能 - SANSPO.COM|accessdate=2009-10-05|date=2009-10-05}} {{Dead link|date=November 2010|bot=H3llBot}}</ref><ref>[http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2011-12-29/voice-actors-yuuji-kishi-mika-kikuchi-announce-divorce Voice Actors Yuuji Kishi, Mika Kikuchi Announce Divorce]</ref> ==Roles== ===Film=== *[[Mayonaka no Yaji-san Kita-san]] (God of Laughter) (voice) ===Tokusatsu=== *[[Gekisou Sentai Carranger]] (Kyōsuke Jinnai/Red Racer) *[[Seijuu Sentai Gingaman]] (Shunsuke Kishimoto) *[[Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger]] (Camera Org) (voice) *[[Ninpuu Sentai Hurricaneger]] (Kazuma Namekawa) *[[Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger]] (Ganymede) (voice) *[[GoGo Sentai Boukenger]] (Wicked Dragon Dagāgin) (voice) *[[Engine Sentai Go-onger]] (Dumbbell Banki) (voice) *[[Kaizoku Sentai Gokaiger]] (Kyōsuke Jinnai) ===Television animation=== *[[Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex]] *[[Hunter × Hunter]] (Kastro, Kite) *[[Idaten Jump]] (Arthur the Biker Knight) *[[I My Me! Strawberry Eggs!]] (Hibiki Amawa) *[[Kochira Katsushika-ku Kameari Kōen-mae Hashutsujo]] (Saigō Volvo) *[[Kyoshiro to Towa no Sora]] (Sōjirō) *[[Les Misérables: Shōjo Cosette]] ([[Enjolras]]) *[[Saikano]] (Kazu) *[[X-Men: Evolution]] ([[Avalanche (comics)|Lance Alvers/Avalanche]] ([[Christopher Grey]]), [[Colossus (comics)|Colossus]] ([[Michael Adamthwaite]]), [[Duncan Matthews]] ([[Vincent Gale]])) *[[Yu-Gi-Oh! GX|Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX]] (Freed the Brave Wanderer) ===OVA=== *Gekisou Sentai Carranger vs. Ohranger (Kyōsuke Jinnai/Red Racer) *Denji Sentai Megaranger vs. Carranger (Kyōsuke Jinnai/Red Racer) *[[Final Fantasy VII Advent Children]] (Yazoo) *[[Tsubasa: Reservoir Chronicle]]: Tokyo Revelation(Fuma) *Tsubasa: Reservoir Chronicle: Spring Thunder (Fuma) ===Video games=== *[[Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex]] ([[Crunch Bandicoot]]) ([[Kevin Michael Richardson]]) *[[Crash Nitro Kart]] (Crunch Bandicoot) (Kevin Michael Richardson) *[[JoJo's Bizarre Adventure (video game)|JoJo's Bizarre Adventure]] (Vanilla Ice) *[[JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Gold Whirlwind]] ([[Polpo (manga)|Polpo]], [[Formaggio]]) *[[SNK vs. Capcom (series)|SNK vs. Capcom series]] (Ken - not ''[[SVC Chaos: SNK vs. Capcom]]'') *[[Street Fighter III|Street Fighter III 3rd Strike: Fight for the Future]] (Ken) *[[Suikoden IV]] (Ramada, Count Fingāfūto) *[[Tales of Symphonia: Dawn of the New World]] (Hawk) *[[Ys (video game)|Ys I & II]] (Darm) *[[Street Fighter]] series ([[Ken Masters]]) ===Dubbing=== *[[Power Rangers Turbo]] ([[Theodore Jay Jarvis Johnson]] ([[Selwyn Ward]])) *[[Power Rangers in Space]] (Theodore Jay Jarvis Johnson (Selwyn Ward), [[Dark Specter]] ([[Christopher Cho]]), Black Alien Ranger) *[[Power Rangers Lost Galaxy]] (Theodore Jay Jarvis Johnson, Ironite) *[[Wreck-It Ralph]] (Ken Masters) ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www3.airnet.ne.jp/codered/index.html Code Red] ''(Japanese)'' *[http://www.mausu.net/talent/tpdb_view.cgi?UID=94 Mausu Promotion profile] ''(Japanese)'' * {{ann|people|7135}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kishi Yuji | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = 1970-09-28 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Tokyo, Japan | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kishi Yuji}} [[Category:1970 births]] [[Category:Japanese voice actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Tokusatsu actors]] {{japan-voice-actor-stub}}
